content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2021/month=07/green_tripdata_2021-07.csv',
        'trip_data_green_csv/year=2021/month=01/green_tripdata_2021-01.csv',
        'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=12/green_tripdata_2021-12.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2021/month=07/green_tripdata_2021-07.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2021/month=07/*',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2021/*/*',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2021/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/green_tripdata_*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


SELECT TOP 100
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/green_tripdata_*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(1)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/green_tripdata_*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY result.filename()


SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(1) AS number_of_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/green_tripdata_*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-09.csv','green_tripdata_2020-08.csv')
GROUP BY result.filename()


SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.filepath() AS file_path,
    COUNT(1) AS number_of_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/green_tripdata_*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-09.csv','green_tripdata_2020-08.csv')
GROUP BY result.filename(),result.filepath()


SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    result.filepath(3) AS file_name_1,
    result.filepath() AS file_path,
    COUNT(1) AS number_of_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/green_tripdata_*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-09.csv','green_tripdata_2020-08.csv')
GROUP BY result.filename(),result.filepath(),result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2),result.filepath(3)


SELECT
    result.filepath() AS file_path,
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    COUNT(1) AS number_of_records
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/green_tripdata_*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
--WHERE result.filepath(1) = 2020 AND result.filepath(2) IN (01,12) 
GROUP BY result.filepath(),result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2)
